title: Incompatibility with Node JS 8
body:
## Issue

I tried to install globally  **Truffle** without success

## Steps to Reproduce

npm install -g truffle

## Expected Behavior

Install Truffle

Hi there. Thanks for the issue. Can you check out [our latest blog post](http://truffleframework.com/blog/how-were-making-installation-issues-a-thing-of-the-past) and try out the beta version of Truffle? My guess is that'll fix your issue. Cheers!
